name: SUDOKU - TheSudoku.com
description:
Got a minute? Do a Sudoku! This ever-entertaining game has just got a huge makeover.

Enjoy a never-ending supply of puzzles, make the game just as hard as you want and use lots of super handy features:
* Hints and error highlighting - use it or play hard
* Making notes and applying strategies has never been easier
* Puzzles of any difficulty - for beginners and Sudoku experts
* Rank your times among other players - or just keep the timer off
* Nice and clean board for you to concentrate on the puzzle

Install this free Sudoku game now and get ready for unlimited fun, both online and offline!
